summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.6°C), outside temperature (down 7.4°C), and inside temperature (down 1.9°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 7411 lux), and cloud levels (up 133 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, the air will feel dry and light winds will prevail. Showers, occasional overcast conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. Weather patterns to stay the same.
